value:
[{"from": "Devang Gentyal <darshangentyal02@gmail.com>", "to": null, "subject": "Paid Partnership with Swiggy for Festive Season", "date": "Fri, 22 Aug 2025 23:25:40 +0530", "body": "Hey Mayuresh,

We‚Äôre excited to reach out for a *festive food campaign* with Swiggy. With
Diwali around the corner, we want creators like you to showcase *quick
late-night food cravings* using our new Swiggy One Lite subscription.

Deliverables:

   -

   1 Instagram reel showing your ‚ÄúMidnight Cravings with Swiggy‚Äù
   -

   3 Insta stories tagging @swiggy_in

üìÖ Timeline: October 10 ‚Äì October 30
üí∞ Compensation: ‚Çπ55,000 + free Swiggy One Lite for 1 year

Let me know if you‚Äôre interested, and I‚Äôll share the detailed brief.

Warm regards,
Rohan Sharma
Creator Partnerships ‚Äì Swiggy
", "id": "198d2ec07928fb90"}, {"from": "Victor Erukhimov <victor.erukhimov@itseez3d.com>", "to": "darshangentyal02@gmail.com", "subject": "MetaPerson Creator updates and the partnership with DeepMotion", "date": "Tue,  3 Dec 2024 19:31:08 +0000", "body": "Avatar SDK has partnered with DeepMotion to provide world class animation for the MetaPerson avatars

Dear Darshan,

We have a lot of news about Avatar SDK: release of new assets and facial blends, samples and open source code for the MetaPerson Creator, and the partnership with DeepMotion! Let's dive in!
We have partnered with DeepMotion to provide our customers great experience in creating animations for the MetaPerson avatars! We have released tutorials for Unity (https://avatarsdk.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=deb88daf4b1d7ebe98839116a&id=1dcffe8786&e=63525837ca) and Unreal Engine (https://avatarsdk.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=deb88daf4b1d7ebe98839116a&id=5e92b28e95&e=63525837ca)  on how to use DeepMotion's Animate3D and SayMotion to make avatars walk, run and dance! Additionally, we‚Äôve added comprehensive documentation (https://avatarsdk.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=deb88daf4b1d7ebe98839116a&id=d44f212f82&e=63525837ca)  to support your learning journey. Also, we are providing a 20% discount code for new DeepMotion customers! Please redeem the code AVATARSDK24 before February 2, 2025 when purchasing a subscription to Animate3D (https://avatarsdk.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=deb88daf4b1d7ebe98839116a&id=66cc8934ae&e=63525837ca)  and SayMotion (https://avatarsdk.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=deb88daf4b1d7ebe98839116a&id=b7b015ea43&e=63525837ca) .
https://avatarsdk.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=deb88daf4b1d7ebe98839116a&id=b564623bd7&e=63525837ca
Sample Facial Animations:
Explore new facial animations based on our mobile_51 blendshape set. Now, you can experiment with facial expressions and animations directly in MetaPerson Creator‚Äînot just skeletal animations!

New Hairstyles Added:

More styles, more possibilities! Check out the latest additions to our hairstyle collection.


Expanded National Outfits: We‚Äôve added new Indian male outfits to our growing library of national costumes. The wardrobe for MetaPerson avatars is getting better every week, thanks to the artists working with us! Got any ideas for what outfits we should include next? We‚Äôd love to hear from you‚Äîshare your suggestions with us!

More Facial Blendshapes:
Customize avatars like never before! We‚Äôve added a significant number of additional blendshapes, making it easier to fine-tune head and facial features after avatar creation.

Updated MetaPerson Loader for Unity:
We‚Äôve enhanced the MetaPerson Loader for Unity, introducing a new Point Cloud Loading Sample. This tool demonstrates how to efficiently reduce network and storage usage when showcasing multiple MetaPerson avatars in one scene. Curious? Check it out here: MetaPerson Point Cloud Loading Sample (https://avatarsdk.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=deb88daf4b1d7ebe98839116a&id=f4bc0bffe3&e=63525837ca) . This concept is adaptable to other graphic engines like Unreal Engine or WebGL!

MetaPerson Creator for Mobile:
We‚Äôre excited to announce an open-source version of this plugin, which is now available for our Enterprise clients. You can access the source code to use it as a starting point for your Three.js projects or leverage it for white-label solutions tailored to your needs.

These updates are crafted to enhance your experience, making MetaPerson Creator even more powerful, versatile, and seamless to integrate into your projects. Are you ready to dive in? Learn about MetaPerson avatars, watch tutorials, or create your own avatar by clicking the button below!
Learn more about MetaPerson Creator (https://avatarsdk.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=deb88daf4b1d7ebe98839116a&id=a291daf5fe&e=63525837ca)
Best Regards,
Your Avatar SDK team

============================================================

summary:
Found emails related to collaborations, partnerships, and brand deals:
- Swiggy offers a paid partnership for a festive food campaign (‚Çπ55,000 + Swiggy One Lite).
- Avatar SDK announced a partnership with DeepMotion for animations, with tutorials & a 20% discount.
- Myntra sent a promotional email about various brand deals and discounts.
- Coursera partnered with Unstop, offering job opportunities (L'Or√©al, Unilever, RateGain), free coding challenges, and discounted mentorships.
